meka.classifiers.multilabel

Class PCC

  • java.lang.Object
    • weka.classifiers.AbstractClassifier
      • weka.classifiers.SingleClassifierEnhancer
        • meka.classifiers.multilabel.MultilabelClassifier
          • meka.classifiers.multilabel.CCe
            • meka.classifiers.multilabel.PCC
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable, weka.classifiers.Classifier, weka.core.CapabilitiesHandler, weka.core.OptionHandler, weka.core.Randomizable, weka.core.RevisionHandler, weka.core.TechnicalInformationHandler

    public class PCC
extends CCe
implements weka.core.TechnicalInformationHandler
    PCC.java - Probabalistic Classifier Chains. Exactly like CC at build time, but explores all possible paths as inference at test time.
    This version is Multi-target capable.
    See Cheng et al, "Bayes Optimal Multi-label Classification via Probabalistic Classifier Chains", ICML 2010.
    Version:
    November 2012
    Author:
    Jesse Read (jesse@tsc.uc3m.es)
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
